page.title: 09CHURCH IN GLENPROSEN
page.content: The small church measures externally only 15 metres by 6 metres. Joined onto the church are a small wooden vestry and a stone vestuable. The small vestuable has an unusual wooden yett.In the vestuable there is a memorial to all the people killed during the world wars. Inside the church we estimated that at 5 people to a small pew, the church could hold 150 people.The average attendance however is 20 people.The roll of the United churches is 320 but of these only 30 live in Glenprosen and use the church here.The services in Prosen Church are every second and fourth Sunday at 12:15pm. There is only one bell and it is rung from the outside of the church before every service. Collection is taken in an old fashioned wooden collecting box on a long pole.
